title: (x) UK highway typeface - Transport {Fabio}
content:
Is someone knows the UK highway signage typeface ?   
(sorry i don't have any picture)   
Is it Clearview ?   
   
thank you for answering
author: Gregory Cadars

comments.content:
Hi!   
The name of typeface is Transport   
   
One digital version are made by URW, try this:   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/transport](http://web.archive.org/web/20131109001334/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/transport)
